description: Excel version of the data included in Attachment A to the Budget Adoption Ordinance.  This data reflects all appropriations (by budget control level) included in the 2011-2012 Proposed Budget.

name: 2011-2012 Proposed Budget - Expenditures Allowance by Budget Control Level (BCL)
